name: Intro
_source: speak;Luther;The path forward is clear, milord.{w}{br}However, they've set fire to parts of the castle.{w}{br}Won't be long until the flames reach us.
speak;Simon;The "New Dawn" only care about looting my castle.{w}{br}Bastards.
speak;Luther;You will have your revenge, Lord Verstadt.
#Add more dialogue and introduce Julia here
speak;Luther;Only a token force has been left in defence.{w}{br}Sire, we must escape to the north.{w}{br}We have an ally in Lord Morrissey,{w} and his demense is the nearest.
speak;Simon;Then we must all reach the gate.
speak;Luther;Nay, only yourself.{w} As our leader, only you must slip from the enemy's grasp.
speak;Simon;But what will happen to you and Vincent?
speak;Luther;We will use the ensuing chaos to break through.{w}{br}You need not fear leaving us behind.
speak;Vincent;One of your servants, and a close friend of mine.
speak;Luther;You appear unarmed.{w} I have a spare bow, are you proficient?
speak;Juliet;I know my way around it.{w}{br}Give it here.
speak;Luther;It would wise to search the courtyard before we battle.{w}{br}Small advantages are found in unexpected places.
speak;Narrator;Juliet uses bows. Bow units can only attack from range.{w}{br}For Juliet to attack an enemy there must be one tile between her and the target.;StyleNid=hint
speak;Narrator;Units you control that fall in battle will return after the map ends.{w}{br}Only Simon's death will cause a game over.;StyleNid=hint
speak;Narrator;During roaming sections, Simon can explore freely.|Hold the B button to run, and press START to open a pause menu.;StyleNid=hint
